title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for antiderivative with or without C

1 point is earned for f′(1) = −6 for student's f′(x)

2 points are earned for setting f′(x) = 0 and solves

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for antiderivative with or without C

1 point is earned for equating student's f(2) and zero

1 point is earned for solving the resulting equation

f( x )=4 x 3 −9 x 2 +C f( 2 )=0=32−36+C ∴C=4 f( x )=4 x 3 −9 x 2 +4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaacaWGMb WaaeWaaeaacaWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaeyypa0JaaGinaiaadIha daahaaWcbeqaaiaaiodaaaGccqGHsislcaaI5aGaamiEamaaCaaale qabaGaaGOmaaaakiabgUcaRiaadoeaaeaacaWGMbWaaeWaaeaacaaI YaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaeyypa0JaaGimaiabg2da9iaaiodacaaIYa GaeyOeI0IaaG4maiaaiAdacqGHRaWkcaWGdbaabaGaeyinIWLaam4q aiabg2da9iaaisdaaeaadaqjEaqaaiaadAgadaqadaqaaiaadIhaai aawIcacaGLPaaacqGH9aqpcaaI0aGaamiEamaaCaaaleqabaGaaG4m aaaakiabgkHiTiaaiMdacaWG4bWaaWbaaSqabeaacaaIYaaaaOGaey 4kaSIaaGinaaaaaaaa@5E69@

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for setting up integral with students f(x) from part (b)

1 point is earned for the antiderivative and evaluation

Note: 0/2 if integrand is not student's f(x)

1 3−1 ∫ 1 3 4 x 3 −9 x 2 +4  dx = 1 2 [ x 4 −3 x 3 +4x ] 1 3 = 1 2 [ ( 81−81+12 )−( 1−3+4 ) ] =5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@6AE0@
